hero.headline: I will increase your team's efficiency +25%
hero.researchNote: According to extensive Harvard research, people working with AI are 25% faster and the quality of their outputs is 40% higher.
hero.subheadline: Inaction is the biggest risk during a technological leap. I'll help your team overcome barriers and teach them to use AI for radical efficiency gains. Only 1% of companies can leverage AI - I'll get you among them.

services.title: How does collaboration work?
services.mainTitle: From chaos to efficiency: Solutions tailored to your company
services.mainIntro: Every team is different. That's why I don't offer boxed training that you'll forget the next day. I offer process transformation that comes directly from your DNA.

step1.title: State analysis
step1.description: First, I listen. I find out how your team is doing, where you're "swimming" in processes, and where money or time is unnecessarily escaping us.

step2.title: Practical part
step2.description: I'll teach you to use AI directly on your processes and be radically more efficient. You'll try, make mistakes, and learn in a safe environment. My goal is for you to leave feeling: "Wow, this will save us hours of work!"

step3.title: Long-term effect
step3.description: I won't disappear. I stay in touch with you to make sure the changes have "settled in" and the team is actually using them.

subsidy.title: Innovate almost for free
subsidy.description: We'll secure funding for this entire program. Thanks to cooperation with my team, your investment can be minimal. We'll handle it for you turnkey.

individual.title: Individual Consultation
individual.subtitle: Personal AI Mentoring
individual.description: Do you have a specific problem? Or do you just need to get oriented in AI possibilities for your role? Let's schedule an hour where we'll look at your specific challenges. Humanly, clearly, effectively.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Who I am and what I've achieved

experience.title: 3+ Years of Experience
experience.shortText: I have more than 3 years of experience implementing AI solutions and transforming business processes.

computertrends.title: TOP IT Personality 2025 by COMPUTERtrends
computertrends.shortText: In 2025, I was awarded as TOP IT Personality by COMPUTERtrends magazine.
computertrends.imageAlt: TOP IT Personality 2025 award by COMPUTERtrends

innovation.title: Innovation Star 2024
innovation.shortText: In 2024, I was selected from thousands of women across Europe to represent the Czech Republic at the European Leadership Academy.
innovation.fullText: In 2024, I was selected from thousands of women across Europe to represent the Czech Republic at the European Leadership Academy, where I received the Innovation Star 2024 award for my results in innovating companies and became a member of the MSIC (Moravian-Silesian Innovation Center) expert group.

president.title: Project Presentation to Petr Pavel
president.shortText: In 2025, I was invited to L√°ny Castle to present my work to President Petr Pavel and receive direct feedback.
president.imageAlt: Project presentation to President Petr Pavel

squash.title: Former Professional Squash Player
squash.shortText: Multiple Czech champion, member of the Czech national team, European TOP6.

education.title: Education and Path to AI
education.shortText: I graduated from an IT-focused university and completed an intensive program with 472+ hours of development with a mentor.
education.fullText: I graduated from an IT-focused university and went through an intensive program where I spent 472+ hours of development with a mentor. I had an arranged start at a company as a junior fullstack developer. But when the AI wave came, something broke in me and I started showing companies around me how to use AI simply and practically.

taskyo.title: Co-Founder of Taskyo
taskyo.shortText: I co-founded Taskyo, where I work with company leadership and their teams.
taskyo.fullText: I co-founded Taskyo, where I work with company leadership and their teams. We design custom AI solutions, train people, and automate key processes so that AI is not an experiment, but part of the company's operations.

international.title: International Experience
international.shortText: I also have experience with international companies. I've consulted in London and Portugal.

lab.title: AI & Business Lab CZ
lab.shortText: Guarantor of innovation implementation and mentor in the AI & Business Lab CZ project.
